On Mon, 10 May 2004 23:49:32 +0100, Colin Green <cgreen@...> wrote:
> I can change in/out to input/output. Although I prefer the shorthand
> version I'm not /that/ bothered + it's a trivial change for me to do.

Don't worry about it.  We'll make the change to "in/out/hid".  That
makes more sense.

 >If
> anyone else is going to want to try and generate SVG it looks like you
> will also currently have to change the "bias" to be an "input" and add
> your own hint-* attributes and a  [recurrent="false"] attribute on each
> conenction. 

Right.  

Thanks,
Derek
